intro: Hieracium praematurum, commonly known as early hawkweed, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and ragworts. The plant is characterized by its yellow flowers and hairy stems, which help it retain moisture in dry environments. It typically grows in meadows, grasslands, and disturbed soils. Hieracium praematurum is an annual or biennial plant that thrives in temperate climates.
